March 14, 2025 - Fortress published The Lutheran, the monthly magazine of the LCA and also of the earlier United Lutheran Church in America. The magazine had its beginnings in 1831 in publications of the General Synod. Augsburg Fortress re-branded as 1517 Media from July 2016 to September 2024.
